fit.description: Image fit mode, optional value is fill contain cover none scale-down
fit.description_zh: 图像拟合模式，可选值为填充、包含覆盖、无缩小

alt.description: Image alt text, the same as the native attribute of the img tag
alt.description_zh: 图片替代文本，与 img 标签的 native 属性相同

width.description: Image title text, the same as the native attribute of the img tag
width.description_zh: 图片标题文本，与 img 标签的原生属性相同

loading.description: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in loading
loading.description_zh: 启用延迟加载时，加载中显示的图像

error.description: When lazy loading is enabled, the image displayed in error
error.description_zh: 启用延迟加载时，图像显示错误

block.description: Whether it is a block element

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on Image

events.name: load
events.description: Triggered when the image is successfully loaded (when the image fails in lazy loading mode, it will only be triggered when the image is successfully loaded)
events.description_zh: 镜像加载成功时触发（镜像在延迟加载模式下失败时，只有在镜像加载成功时才会触发）

events.name: error
events.description: Triggered when an image fails to load (when an image fails in lazy loading mode, it will only be triggered when the number of attempts ends)
events.description_zh: 镜像加载失败时触发（镜像在延迟加载模式下失败时，仅在尝试次数结束时触发）
